attributes.action: Every property within the uk with gas should have a annual gas saftey check
attributes.additional_details:
Ref 9 August 2016 curzon rd Ashton under lyne.
Ref 28 May 2016 whitstable Kent 
Every year more than 200 people go to hospital with suspected carbon monoxide poisoning which leads to around 50 deaths .
Why are only rental properties monitored when every gas appliance can be a Potential killer.
attributes.background: Every month as a registered engineer we receive a gas engineers magerzine with pages of prosecutions of poor work man ship. And landlords that just don't care about there tenants saftey But yet no one looks at private house holds which are no different.

rejection.details: You could start a new petition calling on Parliament to change the law, to make it a legal requirement that every property in the UK should have an annual gas safety check.
